nodes.documentation:
Create a simple auction with `_biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `_beneficiary`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

arguments.value: There already is a higher bid.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

nodes.documentation:
Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
nodes.name: bid

nodes.documentation:
End the auction and send the highest bid
 to the beneficiary.
